description: Initializes the EhCache caching system using configuration properties
Shuts down the cache manager and releases resources
Adds an object to the cache with a specified key
Adds an object to a specific namespace in the cache with a key
Retrieves a cached object by its namespace and key
Retrieves all values stored in a specific cache namespace
Removes a specific item from the cache by namespace and key
Removes an entire namespace from the cache
